qas.question: What percentage of the population speaks Kriol?
What is the official language of Guinea-Bissau?
How long was Guinea-Bissau under colonial rule?
What type of language is Kriol?

context: 14% of the population speaks the official language <a1_0>Portuguese<a1_0/>, the language of government and national communication during <a2_0>centuries<a2_0/> of colonial rule. <a0_0>44%<a0_0/> speak Kriol, <a3_0>a Portuguese-based creole language<a3_0/>, which is effectively a national language of communication among groups. The remainder speak a variety of native African languages unique to ethnicities.
